mutants.code:
import string

def normalize_text(text):
    text = text.lower()
    text = text.translate(str.maketrans('MUTATED', '', string.punctuation))
    text = ''.join([i for i in text if not i.isdigit()])
    text = text.strip()
    text = ' '.join(text.split())
    return text

    text = text.lower()
    text = text.translate(str.maketrans('', 'MUTATED', string.punctuation))
    text = ''.join([i for i in text if not i.isdigit()])

mutants.original_line: text = ''.join([i for i in text if not i.isdigit()])
mutants.mutated_line: text = 'MUTATED'.join([i for i in text if not i.isdigit()])

import string

def normalize_text(text):
    text = text.lower()
    text = text.translate(str.maketrans('', '', string.punctuation))
    text = ''.join([i for i in text if not i.isdigit()])
    text = text.strip()
    text = ''.join(text.split())
    return text
